upgrades.changelog:
* Includes firmware versions: 4.10, 4.20, 4.30, 4.40
* Added new parameter 38 - Dimmer Gamma Factor.
* Added new parameters: 39 - Relay Scene Control Multi-Tap and 40 - Dimmer Scene Control Multi-Tap.
* Added new parameters: 41 - Relay LED Indicator Multi-Color and 42 - Dimmer LED Indicator Multi-Color.
* Fixed: A bug affecting Home Assistant and Z-Wave JS users, where the dimmer part was not correctly updating. Both target value and current value now report as expected.

* Includes firmware versions: 4.10, 4.20, 4.30
* Updated SDK from 7.19.3 to 7.23.1
* Updated parameter names and short descriptions in the Configuration Command Class to match the Advanced Setting Article.

* Includes firmware versions: 4.10, 4.20
* Fixed a bug: With Parameter 28 set to disabled (Dimmer Scene Control - Off), After turning the lights on with a single click (upper paddle), the single click to turn off lights (lower paddle) didn't work anymore.
